nodes.text: Ensign Ta was a female Human soldier who served in the Mantellian army of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Ta, along with Corporal Dregg, and Ensign Peters, was stationed on Ord Mantell during a civil war on the planet. She was stationed in the Avilatan Badlands where the Mantellian Separatist Movement planted unexploded mortar shells. She and Peters were ordered by Dregg to devise a life-or-death game of chance in the region. They are forced to challenge refugees in the area to run the mines and gather three unexploded shells.
